message.content:
cs.SD, cs.CV, cs.SY, cs.LG, cs.MM

The paper deals with audiovisual signal processing and data fusion, which are relevant to several sub-categories in computer science. The use of visual cues and dynamic weighting of sensory streams suggests that the paper could belong to cs.CV (Computer Vision) or cs.MM (Multimedia). The use of state estimation and optimization techniques suggests that the paper could belong to cs.SY (Systems and Control) or cs.LG (Machine Learning). Finally, the focus on speaker tracking and related tasks suggests that the paper could belong to cs.SD (Sound). Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.SD, cs.CV, cs.SY, cs.LG, and cs.MM, in that order.
